name: A Question of Ethics
description: Starfleet touts its aim as the pursuit of knowledge, but this pursuit has not been without missteps or bloodshed. With the convergence of past and present, there are some intent on bringing what they see as the Federation's hypocrisy into the light.
rules:
-- Unique Federation, Maquis, and Section 31 Faction Missions are available during the event. Open the Event to access them.
-- Using any version of Satie, Tabor, Batel, or Interrogators will provide a bonus to Event Faction Missions.
-- Every Event Faction Mission you succeed at earns you Event Victory Points. Collect Victory Points to unlock Event Threshold Rewards.
-- In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
bonus_text: Crew Bonus: Satie, Tabor, Batel, or Interrogators
rewards_teaser: Reach Rank 1 by gaining Victory Points from Event Missions!

featured_crew.name: La Forge
featured_crew.flavor: La Forge has quite a fun time at Troi and Riker's wedding, even managing to learn a little more about Guinan's personal life.

action.name: Did You Ever Think About Getting Married Again?

featured_crew.name: Tabor
featured_crew.flavor: A former Maquis, Tabor joined the Voyager crew. He struggled with memories of the Cardassian scientist's horrific experiments on his family.

action.name: I Promised Myself I Would Never Forget

featured_crew.name: Batel
featured_crew.flavor: At the tribunal in the Chin-Riley case, Batel served as prosecutor - reluctantly.

rewards.name: Federation Transmission
rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Federation faction missions.

rewards.name: Maquis Transmission
rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Maquis faction missions.

rewards.name: Section 31 Transmission
rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Section 31 faction missions.

rewards.name: Merits
rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: 10x S. Shuttle
rewards.flavor: 10 Standard Boosts. Go to Time Portal to collect!

rewards.name: Odo
rewards.flavor: Chief of Security on Deep Space Nine, Odo was a constant presence onboard the station.

rewards.name: Federation Transmission
rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Federation faction missions.

rewards.name: Maquis Transmission
rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Maquis faction missions.

rewards.name: Section 31 Transmission
rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Section 31 faction missions.

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

rewards.name: Credits
rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

rewards.name: Merits
rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: Tokens
rewards.flavor: Requisition Shuttle Tokens grant access to an additional Shuttle to use for a single Faction Mission.

rewards.name: Reward Multiplier
rewards.flavor: (Shuttle Missions Only) 2x rewards.

rewards.name: Credits
rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Voyage Revival
rewards.flavor: Use to instantly revive a failed Voyage.

rewards.name: 10x Portal
rewards.flavor: 10 valuable items. Go to Time Portal to collect!

rewards.name: La Forge
rewards.flavor: La Forge has quite a fun time at Troi and Riker's wedding, even managing to learn a little more about Guinan's personal life.

action.name: Did You Ever Think About Getting Married Again?

rewards.name: Batel
rewards.flavor: At the tribunal in the Chin-Riley case, Batel served as prosecutor - reluctantly.

rewards.name: Rarity
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 5 Polestars: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Super rare, Legendary

rewards.name: Skill
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 6 Polestars: Command, Diplomacy, Security, Engineering, Science, Medicine

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.name: Dilithium
rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Merits
rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: La Forge
rewards.flavor: La Forge has quite a fun time at Troi and Riker's wedding, even managing to learn a little more about Guinan's personal life.

action.name: Did You Ever Think About Getting Married Again?

rewards.name: Batel
rewards.flavor: At the tribunal in the Chin-Riley case, Batel served as prosecutor - reluctantly.

rewards.name: Rarity
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 5 Polestars: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Super rare, Legendary

rewards.name: Skill
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 6 Polestars: Command, Diplomacy, Security, Engineering, Science, Medicine

screens.text: "How convenient it is for you to call me a terrorist as you sit there in pristine dress uniforms. To scrutinize us at the height of desperation. We were victims, trying to survive. Not only did your Federation hand us over to the Cardassians, you handed your own over as well."

"Enough, Mr. Tabor. We understand you dealt with inconceivable loss at that time, the ripples of which clearly still impact you even now. But with all of the arrivals via temporal anomaly, the Federation is under a great deal of scrutiny and justice must be served."
"Justice? Bajor-occupying Cardassians arrive in the present and accuse us of terrorism and you bend to them in the name of justice?! Just because I wear this uniform? Where's my justice?!"

"Captain, Mr. Tabor's case is one of thousands of ethics complaints we have received since the start of the anomaly crisis. We cannot simply ignore them. But the rear admiral's black-and-white view of justice threatens to undermine everything we've worked toward. Please help us."
